name: Auckland
trans: 奥克兰（新西兰北岛西北岸港口城市）

sentences.english: I lived in Auckland, New Zealand, in my own flat with my dog.
sentences.chinese: 我住在新西兰的奥克兰，我与我的狗住在我自己的公寓里。

sentences.english: Vancouver, Auckland and Sydney were the only non-European cities in the top 10.
sentences.chinese: 在前10名中，温哥华、奥克兰和悉尼是仅有的几个非欧洲城市。

sentences.english: For me the ultimate voyage is the Bank Line voyage from Auckland, New Zealand, to Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，最长的行程是新西兰奥克兰前往新加坡的海岸线航行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 奥克兰（新西兰北岛西北岸港口城市）

name: Maori
trans: （新西兰的）毛利人，毛利语；毛利语

sentences.english: Maori cannibalism has been stamped out in New Zealand and many (but not all) of the archipelagos to its north.
sentences.chinese: 而在新西兰和新西兰以北的大部分群岛上，毛利人的食人陋习已被扑灭。

sentences.english: And the streams that wash down from the glacier-capped peaks carry a highly prized stone, a hard, translucent, green rock that the Maori carved into jewelry and blades, for both tools and weapons.
sentences.chinese: 从冰川包覆的山巅冲击而下的湍流携下一种具有很高价值的玉石，毛利人将这种硬质半透明的石头雕刻成为珠宝和刀刃，既是工具也可以作为武器。

sentences.english: This kiss is also performed by numerous Pacific Islander cultures, including the Maori of New Zealand, where it is a ritual greeting.
sentences.chinese: 这种亲吻方式也是很多太平洋的岛上居民所采用的，包括新西兰的毛利人，他们就是这样相互问候的。

detailed_translations.english: someone who belongs to the race of people that first lived in New Zealand and now forms only a small part of the population

name: kiwi
trans: 几维鸟（新西兰产的一种无翼鸟）

sentences.english: Other sources of vitamin E include wheat germ oil, dry almond, safflower oil, hazelnut, peanut butter, spinach, broccoli, kiwi, and mango.
sentences.chinese: 维生素E的其他来源的包括小麦胚芽油，干杏仁，红花油，榛子，花生酱，菠菜，西兰花，猕猴桃，芒果。

detailed_translations.chinese: 猕猴桃；几维（一种新西兰产的无翼鸟）；新西兰人
detailed_translations.english: a New Zealand bird that cannot fly

name: Stewart Island
trans: 斯图尔特岛（新西兰一岛屿）

sentences.english: The Little Blue Penguin and the Stewart Island Shag can also be seen here in their natural environment.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，还可以看到自然生态环境中的小蓝企鹅和斯图尔特岛鹭鸶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 斯图尔特岛（新西兰一岛屿）

name: tectonic
trans: 地壳构造上的，起因于地壳运动的

sentences.english: tectonic movements
sentences.chinese: 地壳构造运动

detailed_translations.english: relating to  plate tectonics

sentences.english: With geological maps, books, and atlases you can find out all the proven sites of precious minerals.
sentences.chinese: 有了地质地图、书籍和地图册，你就可以找到所有已探明的珍贵矿藏的位置。

detailed_translations.english: Geological means relating to geology

sentences.english: He was visiting professor of geology at the University of Georgia.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是佐治亚大学的地质学客座教授。

sentences.english: the geology of the British Isles
sentences.chinese: 不列颠群岛的地质

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of the earth, including the origin and history of the rocks and soil of which the earth is made

sentences.english: A broad valley opened up leading to a high, flat plateau of cultivated land.
sentences.chinese: 一个宽阔的山谷展开，通向一片平坦的高原耕地。

sentences.english: Inflation rates have reached a plateau.
sentences.chinese: 通货膨胀率已趋平稳。

detailed_translations.english: a large area of flat land that is higher than the land around it

sentences.english: They headed the storm crossing over Alps to Italy.
sentences.chinese: 他们迎着暴风雪越过了阿尔卑斯山脉，朝着意大利进发。

sentences.english: French troops negotiated the Alps and went on the road in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 法军成功地越过了阿尔卑斯山脉，行军在意大利的国土上。

sentences.english: The high mountainous Alps in the west of Austria flatten somewhat into low lands and plains in the east of the country.
sentences.chinese: 奥地利西面的阿尔卑斯高山变得有些平坦，直接和国家的东面的低地和平原融为一体。

sentences.english: Farmers are the backbone of this community.
sentences.chinese: 农场主是这个团体的中坚力量。

detailed_translations.chinese: 支柱；主干网；决心，毅力；脊椎
detailed_translations.english: the row of connected bones that go down the middle of your back

sentences.english: fields where they used to graze their sheep
sentences.chinese: 他们过去放羊的田野

detailed_translations.english: if an animal grazes, or if you graze it, it eats grass that is growing
to accidentally break the surface of your skin by rubbing it against something
a wound caused by rubbing that slightly breaks the surface of your skin

sentences.english: Strip the beds and wash the sheets.
sentences.chinese: 把床单撤下来清洗。

sentences.english: a strip of paper
sentences.chinese: 一张纸条

detailed_translations.english: to remove something that is covering the surface of something else
a long narrow piece of paper, cloth etc

name: Christchurch
trans: 克莱斯特彻奇（新西兰南岛东岸港口城市）

sentences.english: The United States stands ready to provide assistance to the government of New Zealand and to the brave people of Christchurch.
sentences.chinese: 克林顿说：“美国随时准备向新西兰政府和克赖斯特彻奇勇敢的人民提供援助。

detailed_translations.chinese: 克莱斯特彻奇（新西兰南岛东岸港口城市）

sentences.english: carved wooden chairs
sentences.chinese: 木雕椅子

sentences.english: Carve the meat into slices.
sentences.chinese: 把肉切成片。

detailed_translations.english: to make an object or pattern by cutting a piece of wood or stone

sentences.english: Each man had a paddle for an hour and then a rest.
sentences.chinese: 每人划一小时桨， 然后休息一下。

sentences.english: We strive to paddle to follow the stream, however, we are unsure if how and when we will reach the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着河流奋力划桨，但是我们无法确定我们什么时候和怎样才能到达地平线。

sentences.english: If you run your team as if they were self-leading, but in reality they’re chaos, then before long you’ll be heading up a certain creek without a paddle.
sentences.chinese: 如果你当他们是自我引导型的团队在运作，但其实他们事实上还是在混乱的状态，那么不久你就会在一条河上像没有桨似的乱窜。

detailed_translations.english: a short pole that is wide and flat at the end, used for moving a small boat in water
to move a small light boat through water, using one or more paddles

name: uninhabited
trans: 无人居住的，杳无人迹的

sentences.english: an uninhabited island
sentences.chinese: 杳无人迹的荒岛

detailed_translations.chinese: 无人居住的,杳无人迹的
detailed_translations.english: an uninhabited place does not have anyone living there

sentences.english: species in danger of extinction
sentences.chinese: 有灭绝危险的物种

sentences.english: They were hunted almost to extinction.
sentences.chinese: 它们遭受猎杀，几近灭绝。

sentences.english: Conservationists are trying to save the whale from extinction.
sentences.chinese: 生态环境保护工作者正努力挽救鲸类以防止其灭绝。

detailed_translations.english: when a particular type of animal or plant stops existing

sentences.english: It ate fern leaves and pine trees.
sentences.chinese: 它吃蕨类植物的叶子以及松树。

sentences.english: Most cannot forget that year summer, he mails a piece of fern from the highest mountain for me the leaf.
sentences.chinese: 最不能忘记那年夏天，他从最高的山上为我寄来一片蕨类植物的叶子。

sentences.english: Her dark eyes watched the dance hungrily from her position behind a tall fern, and he felt his heart beat faster.
sentences.chinese: 她那乌溜溜的双眼饥饿地从一棵高大的蕨类植物后面望着舞会，他感觉到自己的心跳加快了。

detailed_translations.english: a type of plant with green leaves shaped like large feathers, but no flowers

sentences.english: Food was often scarce in the winter.
sentences.chinese: 冬季常常粮食短缺。

sentences.english: There was fierce competition for the scarce resources .
sentences.chinese: 对这些紧缺资源的争夺非常激烈。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺乏的， 不足的； 稀少的， 罕见的
detailed_translations.english: if something is scarce, there is not very much of it available

sentences.chinese: 好战的民族

detailed_translations.chinese: 战争的；好战的；有战争危险的

sentences.chinese: 一个叫“海豚族”的澳大利亚土著部落

detailed_translations.english: a social group consisting of people of the same  race  who have the same beliefs, customs, language etc, and usually live in one particular area ruled by their leader

sentences.english: Experts say if the island is not protected, the spill could wipe out the gulf's turtle population.
sentences.chinese: 专家们说如果那座小岛得不到保护，此次泄露有可能使该海湾地区的海龟灭绝。

detailed_translations.english: To wipe out something such as a place or a group of people or animals means to destroy them completely

sentences.english: I'm going to take over the company one day.
sentences.chinese: 我总有一天会接管这家公司。

detailed_translations.english: If you take over a company, you get control of it, for example, by buying its shares

sentences.english: Villagers say the fence would restrict public access to the hills.
sentences.chinese: 村民们说栅栏将限制公众进入山区。

detailed_translations.english: a structure made of wood, metal etc that surrounds a piece of land

detailed_translations.chinese: 防护；用篱笆围住；练习剑术
detailed_translations.english: to fight with a long thin sword as a sport

sentences.english: To protect you against small pox or diphtheria, you are vaccinated with a small amount of the toxin, and then your body develops immunity against that toxin.
sentences.chinese: 为了避免你长小脓包或得白喉病，所以会给你的身体接种小量毒素，然后你的身体会针对这些毒素产生免疫力。

sentences.english: Very few people will have any immunity to this particular combination, which is what gives the concern that this will be a pandemic rather than just a normal seasonal flu outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 因为很少有人具备对这种特别的混合病毒的免疫力。 人们因此担心，这将不仅仅是正常的季节性流感疫情，而是一次传染病的大流行。

sentences.english: But a new study shows that people with true expertise in a subject have some immunity to the siren song of corporate sponsorship.
sentences.chinese: 一项新的研究发现，在某一方面有真才实学的人们对广告赞助商的“糖衣炮弹”有一定的免疫力。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being immune to a disease

sentences.english: Once we’ve had the disease, we’re immune for life.
sentences.chinese: 我们一旦得过这种病，就获得了终身免疫力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 免疫的， 有免疫力的， 不受影响的； 免除的， 豁免的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is immune to a particular disease cannot catch it

sentences.english: He converted to Christianity that day.
sentences.chinese: 那天他改信了基督教。

detailed_translations.chinese: 基督教；基督教精神，基督教教义
detailed_translations.english: the religion based on the life and beliefs of Jesus Christ

sentences.english: Both sides have agreed to sign the treaty .
sentences.chinese: 双方都同意签署该条约。

sentences.english: The peace treaty ends nearly four years of violence.
sentences.chinese: 该和平条约结束了将近四年的暴力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 条约， 协议， 协定
detailed_translations.english: a formal written agreement between two or more countries or governments

sentences.english: The latest incident is representative of a wider trend.
sentences.chinese: 最近发生的事件代表了一个更大的趋势。

sentences.chinese: 房价在不断上涨。

detailed_translations.english: a political situation in which people protest or behave violently

sentences.chinese: 许多无辜的平民在战争中丧生。

sentences.english: It was difficult to return to civilian life after ten years in the military.
sentences.chinese: 从军十年后重新过平民生活不容易。

detailed_translations.english: anyone who is not a member of the military forces or the police
used to describe people or things that are not military

sentences.english: If you enjoy the thrill of bungee jumping, you probably found 2010 an exhilarating sales year.
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜欢蹦极跳的刺激，你可能会发现2010是一个令人振奋销售年度。

sentences.english: And so Eagleman came up with an original experimental paradigm: SCAD jumping, which is often described as bungee jumping without the bungee.
sentences.chinese: 所以，毅革曼想出了一个原创的实验范式：SCAD跳，它通常被描述为没有蹦极的蹦极跳。

sentences.chinese: 哦，在澳大利亚的时候我们去玩了蹦极跳。

sentences.english: ‘I’m going now,’ she said, fastening her coat.
sentences.chinese: “现在我要走了。”她一边说，一边扣上大衣。

sentences.english: Fasten your seat belt.

sentences.english: Symptoms include tiredness and loss of appetite.

detailed_translations.english: a desire for food

sentences.chinese: 我们的出租车停在老德里车站，一个搬运工疾步跑向车门。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to carry people’s bags at railway stations, airports etc

sentences.english: a honeymoon suite
sentences.chinese: 蜜月套房

sentences.english: a suite of rooms for palace guests
sentences.chinese: 王室贵宾套房

sentences.chinese: 电视放映室

sentences.chinese: 她洗了衣服，然后挂出去晾干。

sentences.chinese: 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

sentences.chinese: 那架直升机就在我们头顶的上方。

sentences.english: They were succoured from the fire by the rescue helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 他们被援救的直升机从大火中解救了出来。

detailed_translations.english: a type of aircraft with large metal blades on top which turn around very quickly to make it fly

sentences.chinese: 今天早上我去了一个以自助早午餐而闻名的餐厅。

sentences.english: Instead of a seated dinner, consider hosting a Sunday brunch with Champagne Bellini’s.
sentences.chinese: 可以考虑举办一次有香槟酒的周日早午餐而非就坐的宴会。

detailed_translations.english: a meal eaten in the late morning, as a combination of breakfast and  lunch

detailed_translations.chinese: 内皮尔（新西兰北岛东岸港口城市）；纳皮尔（人名）

sentences.english: Severino says the focus now should be on helping the people of Burma.
sentences.chinese: 塞韦里诺说，现在的工作重点应该是帮助缅甸人民。

sentences.chinese: 陶波湖岸上布满了一片片的浮石。

sentences.english: Today, New Zealand's Lake Taupo is a serene sheet of fresh water, beloved of crayfish and hikers alike.
sentences.chinese: 今天，新西兰的陶波湖是一片宁静的淡水湖，为小龙虾和徒步旅行者所喜欢。

sentences.chinese: 陶波湖火山的巨大喷发在新西兰北岛的中部形成了承载陶波湖的火山喷口。

sentences.chinese: 在我小时候，本地的乳品公司向当地农场主收购牛奶。

sentences.chinese: 这次出行是为了能驶入冰雪覆盖的峡湾。

sentences.english: No matter what you do or where you live, your attitude determines the quality of your relationships—not to mention anything else in your life.

sentences.chinese: 他唯一的消遣就是喝啤酒和看足球比赛。

sentences.chinese: 公司推出了大量新软件产品。

name: abseil
trans: （登山运动员）绕绳下降，悬绳滑锁

sentences.chinese: Mick说道：“我们会被绳子吊着下降约200英尺，而大楼会随着风微微摇晃，你只能随着绳子左右摇摆。”

sentences.english: If necessary, we can use aluminium instead of steel.
sentences.chinese: 如果必要，我们可用铝代钢。

detailed_translations.english: a silver-white metal that is very light and is used to make cans, cooking pans, window frames etc. It is a chemical  element  : symbol Al

sentences.english: Ethiopia has no surplus food.
sentences.chinese: 埃塞俄比亚没有多余的食物。

detailed_translations.english: more than what is needed or used
an amount of something that is more than what is needed or used

name: Arthur Conan Doyle
trans: 亚瑟.柯南道尔（1859-1930，英国医师、小说家、推理小说家，创造了私人侦探福尔摩斯的形象）

sentences.english: Arthur Conan Doyle, himself a physician, imbued his character with the kind of keen observational skills so essential to a good physician.
sentences.chinese: 内科医生亚瑟柯南道尔笔下的角色，具有敏锐的观察力，这对一个好医生来说相当重要。

sentences.english: They admitted they had made cut-out fairies and held them up with hatpins, and said they realized the joke had gone too far when Arthur Conan Doyle was duped.
sentences.chinese: 他们承认他们只是用纸剪出小精灵的形状然后用别针固定照了几张相，直到柯南·道尔也上当之后他们才意识到这玩笑开大了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 亚瑟.柯南道尔（1859-1930，英国医师、小说家、推理小说家，创造了私人侦探福尔摩斯的形象）

name: Sherlock Holmes
trans: 夏洛克.福尔摩斯（英国作家柯南.道尔作品中的名侦探）

sentences.english: By the way, do you like the Sherlock Holmes in movies?
sentences.chinese: 顺便问一下，你喜欢电影中的夏洛克•福尔摩斯吗？

sentences.english: I’ve enlisted the help of Master Detective Sherlock Holmes to help guide us on our search.
sentences.chinese: 我已经列举出大侦探夏洛克福尔摩斯的箴言教导，引领我们向前进。

detailed_translations.chinese: 夏洛克.福尔摩斯（英国作家柯南.道尔作品中的名侦探）

sentences.english: Flames poured out of the windows of the building.
sentences.chinese: 火焰从大楼窗口冒出来。

sentences.english: They rushed past us with buckets of water and tried to douse the flames .
sentences.chinese: 他们提着一桶桶水跑过我们身边去灭火。

sentences.english: They sat around the campfire, watching the flickering flames .
sentences.chinese: 他们围坐在篝火旁，看着跳动的火焰。

sentences.english: Flames quickly engulfed the building.
sentences.chinese: 火焰很快吞噬了大楼。

sentences.english: a candle flame
sentences.chinese: 烛焰

detailed_translations.english: hot bright burning gas that you see when something is on fire
to burn brightly

sentences.english: Elsa is telephoning the greengrocer. The plumber is putting a new seat on the toilet bowl.
sentences.chinese: 埃尔莎在给蔬菜水果商打电话，管子工在马桶上装了一个新座垫。

sentences.english: Yet he was rarely in despair. He spoke lATer of his sATisfaction AT seeing signs he had designed hanging above a greengrocer's or butcher's shop.
sentences.chinese: 他虽饥寒交迫，但并不气馁。他后来追述当年的心情时说道，在看到自己设计的招牌悬挂在一家蔬菜水果店或者肉店的上方时，他委实感实心满意足。

detailed_translations.english: someone who owns or works in a shop selling fruit and vegetables

sentences.english: The alley led to the railway bridge.
sentences.chinese: 这条小巷通往铁路桥。

sentences.english: She found the side alley where the stage door was located.
sentences.chinese: 她找到了剧场后门所在的小巷。

detailed_translations.english: a narrow street between or behind buildings, not usually used by cars

sentences.english: to make a remark
sentences.chinese: 发表评论

sentences.english: Critics remarked that the play was not original.
sentences.chinese: 评论家们指出这部戏剧缺乏创意

detailed_translations.english: something that you say when you express an opinion or say what you have noticed
to say or write a comment about sth/sb

sentences.english: What do you make of the idea?
sentences.chinese: 你对这个主意有什么看法？

detailed_translations.english: If you ask a person what they make of something, you want to know what their impression, opinion, or understanding of it is.

sentences.english: Well, what did you make of her?
sentences.chinese: 那么，你认为她怎么样？

sentences.english: a presidential candidate
sentences.chinese: 总统候选人

sentences.english: Candidates are not allowed to use a calculator in this exam.
sentences.chinese: 这次考试的应试者不可以使用计算器。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is being considered for a job or is competing in an election

sentences.english: Will these finds furnish more information on prehistoric man?
sentences.chinese: 这些发现是否能提供更多有关史前人类的资料？

sentences.english: Having bought the house, they couldn’t afford to furnish it.
sentences.chinese: 买下房子后，他们没有钱买家具了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 装备，布置 （房间、建筑物）；供应，提供
detailed_translations.english: to put furniture and other things into a house or room

sentences.english: Two girls were expelled from school for taking drugs.
sentences.chinese: 两名女生因吸毒而被学校开除。

sentences.english: Foreign priests were expelled from the country.
sentences.chinese: 外国牧师被驱逐出境。

sentences.english: As the lungs exhale this waste, gas is expelled into the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 当肺呼出这股废气，气体就被排到空气中。

detailed_translations.english: to officially force someone to leave a school or organization

sentences.english: Sales staff get a generous mileage allowance or a company car.
sentences.chinese: 销售人员有优厚的里程补贴或者公司提供的专用汽车。

sentences.english: If you are entitled to sickness allowance, you must claim it from your employer.
sentences.chinese: 你如果有资格领取疾病津贴，必须向雇主申请索要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 津贴， 补贴； 零用钱
detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you are given regularly or for a special purpose

sentences.english: Normally loners, every so often these natives of the deserts from West Africa to India turn into vast, voracious swarms that leave hunger and poverty behind them wherever they go.
sentences.chinese: 这些来自从西非到印度沙漠的土生昆虫通常并不成群，但是偶尔也会汇集成巨大、贪婪的蝗群，它们所到之处能留下的是饥饿和贫困。

name: peculiar
trans: 古怪的，奇怪的；特殊的，罕见的

sentences.english: He’s been a little peculiar lately.
sentences.chinese: 最近他有点怪异。

sentences.english: She’s a very peculiar child.
sentences.chinese: 她是个非常古怪的孩子。

detailed_translations.english: behaving in a strange and slightly crazy way

sentences.english: the government’s long-term economic strategy
sentences.chinese: 政府的长期经济策略

sentences.english: a company’s business strategy
sentences.chinese: 公司的经营策略

detailed_translations.english: a planned series of actions for achieving something

name: myth
trans: 神话，虚构的理念或者故事

sentences.english: a book of Greek myths
sentences.chinese: 一本关于希腊神话的图书

sentences.english: the giants of myth and fairytale
sentences.chinese: 神话和童话里的巨人

detailed_translations.english: an ancient story, especially one invented in order to explain natural or historical events

sentences.english: the gorgeous vocal harmonies on ‘Mexicali Rose’
sentences.chinese: 《墨西哥玫瑰》的精彩和声演唱

sentences.english: three-part harmonies
sentences.chinese: 三部和声

detailed_translations.english: notes of music combined together in a pleasant way

sentences.english: Britain’s depressed housing market
sentences.chinese: 英国不景气的房产市场

sentences.english: She felt lonely and depressed .
sentences.chinese: 她感到孤独和沮丧。

detailed_translations.english: an area, industry etc that is depressed does not have enough economic or business activity

name: well-balanced
trans: 很平衡的，正常的；意识健全的，明智的

sentences.english: ...a well-balanced diet.
sentences.chinese: …一份均衡的饮食。

sentences.english: ...a fun-loving, well-balanced individual.
sentences.chinese: …一个风趣而明智的人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 很平衡的，正常的；意识健全的，明智的
detailed_translations.english: If you describe something that is made up of several parts as well-balanced, you mean that the way that the different parts are put together is good, because there is not too much or too little of any one part

sentences.english: The new drug will not require a physician's prescription.
sentences.chinese: 这种新药不需要医生的处方。

sentences.english: If you’re pregnant, you can get free prescriptions.
sentences.chinese: 要是怀孕的话可以获得免费的处方药。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of paper on which a doctor writes what medicine a sick person should have, so that they can get it from a pharmacist

sentences.english: Sometimes I find it hard to cope.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我觉得很难应付。

sentences.english: He coped quite well as manager while still captaining the team.
sentences.chinese: 他是球队的主教练，同时兼任队长，干得相当好。

detailed_translations.english: to succeed in dealing with a difficult problem or situation

sentences.english: She feared she wouldn’t be able to cope with two new babies.
sentences.chinese: 她担心自己无法应付两个刚出生的宝宝。

sentences.english: Don't worry, Xiao, I won't let you down.
sentences.chinese: 不要担心，肖，我不会让你失望的。

detailed_translations.english: If you let someone down, you disappoint them, by not doing something that you have said you will do or that they expected you to do

sentences.english: A large proportion of the dolphins in that area will eventually die.
sentences.chinese: 那个地区的很大一部分海豚最终都会死去。

sentences.english: What’s the proportion of boys to girls in your class?
sentences.chinese: 你们班里男女生的比例是多少？

detailed_translations.english: a part of a number or an amount, considered in relation to the whole

sentences.english: There is little doubt that the scheme fulfils a need for our community.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，这计划会满足我们社区的需求。

sentences.english: Visiting Disneyland has fulfilled a boyhood dream.
sentences.chinese: 迪士尼乐园之游使童年梦想成真。

detailed_translations.english: to do or provide what is necessary or needed

sentences.english: The cheaper drugs are just as effective in treating arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 较便宜的药品对治疗关节炎同样有效。

sentences.english: the painting’s highly effective use of colour
sentences.chinese: 绘画中得心应手的色彩运用

sentences.english: Training is often much less effective than expected.
sentences.chinese: 训练的效果往往远低于预期。

sentences.english: the most effective ways of reducing inner city congestion
sentences.chinese: 减少旧城区交通拥挤最有效的办法

detailed_translations.english: successful, and working in the way that was intended

sentences.english: The Republicans have stuck to their conservative agenda.
sentences.chinese: 共和党人坚持自己的保守议题。

detailed_translations.chinese: 议程；日常工作事项；日程表
detailed_translations.english: a list of problems or subjects that a government, organization etc is planning to deal with

name: interval
trans: 间隔，间歇；幕间（工间）休息

sentences.english: He left the room, returning after a short interval with a message.
sentences.chinese: 他离开房间，过了一会儿就带回来一条消息。

sentences.english: We can get some drinks in the interval.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在幕间休息时喝点什么。

sentences.english: Trees had been planted at regular intervals.
sentences.chinese: 树已按均距栽种。

detailed_translations.english: the period of time between two events, activities etc

sentences.english: Board members met in closed session (= with nobody else present ) .
sentences.chinese: 委员会成员举行了闭门会议。

detailed_translations.english: a formal meeting or group of meetings, especially of a law court or parliament

sentences.english: Customs officials have made a series of contradictory statements about the equipment.
sentences.chinese: 海关官员们对于这种设备做出了一系列相互矛盾的陈述。

detailed_translations.chinese: 矛盾的；反对的；反驳的；抗辩的
detailed_translations.english: two statements, beliefs etc that are contradictory are different and therefore cannot both be true or correct

sentences.english: The college has revised its plans because of local objections.
sentences.chinese: 由于地方上的反对，学院已经修改了计划。

sentences.english: We have revised our estimates of population growth.
sentences.chinese: 我们已修正了对人口增长的估计。

detailed_translations.english: to change something because of new information or ideas

sentences.english: Languages are an essential part of the school curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 语言是学校课程中必不可少的部分。

sentences.english: curriculum planning
sentences.chinese: 课程安排

detailed_translations.english: the subjects that are taught by a school, college etc, or the things that are studied in a particular subject

sentences.english: The atmosphere at work is fairly informal.
sentences.chinese: 工作气氛相当轻松。

sentences.english: The two groups met for informal talks.
sentences.chinese: 两个团体会面举行非正式会谈。

detailed_translations.chinese: 非正式的；不拘礼节的；随便的；通俗的；日常使用的
detailed_translations.english: relaxed and friendly without being restricted by rules of correct behaviour

sentences.english: I’m always working under pressure to meet deadlines (= finish something on time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我总是在赶工期的压力下工作。

detailed_translations.english: a date or time by which you have to do or complete something

sentences.english: rigid plastic
sentences.chinese: 硬塑料

detailed_translations.english: stiff and not moving or bending

name: subscribe
trans: （常与 to 连用）同意，赞同

sentences.english: My main reason for subscribing to New Scientist is to keep abreast of advances in science.
sentences.chinese: 我订阅《新科学家》的主要原因是要跟上科学的进步。

sentences.english: Each employee may subscribe for up to £2,000 worth of shares.
sentences.chinese: 每位员工最高可以认购价值 2,000 英镑的股份。

sentences.english: The tour of Edinburgh is fully subscribed.
sentences.chinese: 去爱丁堡旅游的名额已经满了。

detailed_translations.english: to pay money, usually once a year, to have copies of a newspaper or magazine sent to you, or to have some other service

sentences.english: Dr Hoffman did his postgraduate work at Leicester University.
sentences.chinese: 霍夫曼博士是在莱斯特大学读的研究生。

detailed_translations.english: A postgraduate or a postgraduate student is a student with a first degree from a university who is studying or doing research at a more advanced level
Postgraduate study or research is done by a student who has a first degree and is studying or doing research at a more advanced level.

name: academy
trans: 研究院，学术团体；高等专科院校

sentences.english: the American Academy of Arts and Letters
sentences.chinese: 美国艺术和文学学会

detailed_translations.chinese: 学院；研究院；学会；专科院校
detailed_translations.english: an official organization which encourages the development of literature, art, science etc

sentences.english: My grandmother and aunt will be there in my parents' stead.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖母和姑妈将代替我的父母出席。

sentences.english: These two games here will stand them in good stead for the future.
sentences.chinese: 这里的两场比赛对他们的将来很有用。

detailed_translations.english: If you do something in someone's stead, you replace them and do it instead of them.

sentences.english: These two games here will stand them in good stead for the future.
sentences.chinese: 这里的两场比赛对他们的将来很有用。

detailed_translations.english: If you say that something will stand someone in good stead, you mean that it will be very useful to them in the future.

sentences.english: The shoe factory is the largest employer in this area.
sentences.chinese: 这家制鞋厂是本地区最大的雇主。

detailed_translations.english: a person, company, or organization that employs people

sentences.english: a High School diploma
sentences.chinese: 高中毕业文凭

detailed_translations.english: a document showing that a student has successfully completed their high school or university education

sentences.english: The courses were run to a consistent format.
sentences.chinese: 这些课程的编排是有连续性的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 设计，安排；格式，样式，版式
detailed_translations.english: the way in which something such as a television show or meeting is organized or arranged
to organize the space on a computer  disk  so that information can be stored on it

sentences.english: She dreamt of future glory as an Olympic champion.
sentences.chinese: 她梦想着将来能得到奥运冠军的荣誉。

sentences.english: Goran’s moment of glory came when he defeated Rafter.
sentences.chinese: 戈兰击败拉夫特，迎来了荣耀的一刻。

sentences.english: He began the season in a blaze of glory , scoring seven goals in as many games.
sentences.chinese: 这个赛季一开始他便光芒四射，七场比赛进了七个球。

detailed_translations.english: the importance, honour, and praise that people give someone they admire a lot

sentences.english: She didn’t like to glory in her past victories.
sentences.chinese: 她不喜欢躺在过去的功劳簿上不思进取。

detailed_translations.english: to enjoy or be proud of something

sentences.english: My mother has become very forgetful and confused.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲已变得很健忘很糊涂了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 健忘的；不注意的；疏忽的；使遗忘的
detailed_translations.english: often forgetting things

sentences.english: We’re looking for someone with experience in administration.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在寻找一个有管理经验的人。

sentences.english: The health service spends too much on administration.
sentences.chinese: 医疗服务部门在行政方面花费太多。

detailed_translations.english: the activities that are involved in managing the work of a company or organization

sentences.english: The boy sings bass in the choir.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩在合唱团里唱男低音。

sentences.english: You joined the choir, but you don't even like singing. What is your design anyway?
sentences.chinese: 你根本不喜欢唱歌，但是你还是加入了唱诗班。到底你想干什么？

sentences.english: In a window across the street, a boy plays the flute, echoing the choir's songs.
sentences.chinese: 在街对面的一扇窗户里，一位少年吹着长笛，附和着唱诗班的歌声。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people who sing together for other people to listen to

sentences.english: Type your street address and postcode.
sentences.chinese: 键入你的街道地址和邮政编码。

detailed_translations.english: a group of numbers and letters that you write at the end of an address on an envelope, package etc. The postcode shows the exact area where someone lives and helps the post office deliver the post more quickly.

name: withdraw
trans: 收回，撤回；变得沉默寡言，冷漠，冷淡

sentences.english: calls for Britain to withdraw from the European Union
sentences.chinese: 要求英国退出欧盟的呼声

detailed_translations.chinese: 缩回， 退出； 撤退
detailed_translations.english: to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this
to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this

sentences.english: He moved to the seaside for the sake of his health.
sentences.chinese: 他为了健康而迁居海滨。

sentences.english: I only went for Kay’s sake.
sentences.chinese: 我是为了凯才去的。

sentences.english: I hope he’s told the truth for his own sake (= because it will be good for him ) .
sentences.chinese: 为了他自己好，我希望他已经说出了真相。

detailed_translations.english: in order to help, improve, or please someone or something

sentences.english: The quarterback sprinted toward the end zone with Jansen in hot pursuit (= following closely behind ) .
sentences.chinese: 那名四分卫快速冲向底线区，詹森穷追不舍。

detailed_translations.english: when someone tries to get, achieve, or find something in a determined way

name: pursue
trans: 追求，寻求不断努力以取得

sentences.english: She plans to pursue a career in politics.
sentences.chinese: 她计划从政。

sentences.english: Students should pursue their own interests , as well as do their school work.
sentences.chinese: 除了完成课业之外，学生也应该追求自己的兴趣。

sentences.english: a campaign promise to pursue policies that will help the poor
sentences.chinese: 贯彻扶贫政策的竞选承诺

detailed_translations.english: to continue doing an activity or trying to achieve something over a long period of time

sentences.english: Even pedicab drivers were carrying tea samples and looking for clients on the street.
sentences.chinese: 他说，“甚至连三轮车夫都带着茶样，满街寻找顾客。”

detailed_translations.english: a pedal-operated tricycle, available for hire, with an attached seat for one or two passengers

sentences.english: Centrepoint said the number of people under the age of 25 forced to sleep rough in London had more than doubled since 2011.
sentences.chinese: 中心点称25岁以下的人数被迫露宿在伦敦，自2011年以来已经翻了一倍多。

name: feed on
trans: 从……中得到滋养或者满足

sentences.english: Racism feeds on fear.
sentences.chinese: 恐惧心理会助长种族主义。

detailed_translations.chinese: 从……中得到滋养或者满足
detailed_translations.english: to become stronger because of sth else

sentences.english: the philosophical problem of whether there is free will
sentences.chinese: 关于是否有自由意志的哲学问题

sentences.english: a philosophical argument
sentences.chinese: 哲学争论

detailed_translations.english: relating to philosophy

sentences.english: They declared for socialism.
sentences.chinese: 他们表示拥护社会主义。

sentences.english: We should rally under the banner of socialism.
sentences.chinese: 我们应当在社会主义的旗帜下团结起来。

sentences.english: From the Left: Yes! Yes, exactly what socialism is.
sentences.chinese: 从左边的回答：是的，这就是社会主义。

detailed_translations.english: an economic and political system in which large industries are owned by the government, and taxes are used to take some wealth away from richer citizens and give it to poorer citizens

sentences.english: Keep your receipt in case you want to bring it back.
sentences.chinese: 保留收据以备退货之需。

sentences.english: Can you give me a receipt?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我一个收条吗？

name: Sinis
trans: 西尼斯（古希腊神话中的一个强盗）

sentences.chinese: 辛尼斯看到忒修思，就和 他打招呼。

detailed_translations.chinese: 西尼斯（古希腊神话中的一个强盗）

trans: 普罗克拉斯提斯（古希腊神话传说中 Attica 的一个强盗）

sentences.chinese: 在科菲索斯河岸边住着巨人普洛克洛斯忒斯，就象其它的巨人一样，忒修斯早就听说了他的情况。

sentences.english: Procrustes was accustomed to invite strangers to spend a night in his cave, and if the guest were tall he would lead him to the shorter bed.
sentences.chinese: 普洛克洛斯忒斯总是请陌生人到山洞中过夜，如果客人很高，他就把他领到较短的床上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 普罗克拉斯提斯（古希腊神话传说中 Attica 的一个强盗）
detailed_translations.english: a robber, who put travellers in his bed, stretching or lopping off their limbs so that they fitted it

trans: 克里特岛（希腊位于地中海西部的一个岛屿）

sentences.english: Pavlos Tsimas says some people commit suicide in a public way, like the businessman in Crete.
sentences.chinese: 特斯马斯表示一些人以公开的方式自杀，就像克里特岛这位小商人。

sentences.english: LinearB dates from around 1450 BC. It is an archaic form of written Greek used by Greek-speakers who conquered parts of Crete around that time.
sentences.chinese: 线形文字B大约始于公元前1450年，为当时征服了克里特岛部分地区的希腊人使用，是一种古老的书面希腊语。

detailed_translations.chinese: 克里特岛（希腊位于地中海西部的一个岛屿）

sentences.english: ...a special protein which triggers the animal to shed its fleece.
sentences.chinese: …一种能够促使这种动物脱毛的特殊蛋白质。

If you fleece someone, you get a lot of money from them by tricking them or charging them too much

trans: 珀尔休斯（希腊主神宙斯之女，杀死怪 Medusa 的英雄）

sentences.english: The hero is Perseus, called a demi-god, because his father is Zeus the god, while his mother a human.
sentences.chinese: 我们的主角是珀尔修斯，他是一个半人神，因为他的爸爸是一个神，宙斯，而他的妈妈是一个人。

detailed_translations.english: a son of Zeus and Danaë, who with Athena's help slew the Gorgon Medusa and rescued Andromeda from a sea monster

sentences.english: The boys may refuse to play with the girls, and vice versa.
sentences.chinese: 男孩可能拒绝和女孩玩耍，反之亦然。

sentences.english: She won a scholarship to Iowa State University.
sentences.chinese: 她获得了艾奥瓦州立大学的奖学金。

sentences.english: Her latest publication is a fine piece of scholarship.

trans: 使人不安的，（消息）混乱的

sentences.english: As a result, like the physicians in my study, we make dozens of small, subtle and almost invisible choices about how to spend our time.

sentences.chinese: 她满怀期望地看着他。

sentences.chinese: 他们静静地等着，吮着糖果。

an act of sucking

sentences.english: The U.N. had been cooperating with the State Department on a plan to find countries willing to take the refugees.

sentences.chinese: 我的工作之一是分发奖品。

sentences.chinese: 一个男人在他的盥洗室里有五件东西：一把牙刷，剃须膏，剃刀，一盒肥皂和从假日旅馆顺来的一条毛巾。

sentences.chinese: 从一个 XML 文件生成一份简历或履历需要一些额外工作，但能应用一种经过规范的结构，该结构能够帮助确保文档的复杂度满足需求。

sentences.chinese: 斯蒂芬得了个“鹰眼”的绰号。

sentences.chinese: 展示技巧训练课程

name: IELTS
